views.markdown:
Also available:

This is the iPhone X dock for any iOS device other than plus devices (iPhone 6+, 7+ and 8+). This theme can be applied in Anemone. This was made by @artigate on twitter and u/Ghoulec on reddit, he has given me permission to put this on the BigBoss repo. The icons in the screenshot of the dock is my theme "Text-Based". The dock is not dark as shown in the screenshot, that is the tweak Noctis being used. Thank you very much!

Configure Anemone from Settings.
